mainBoard.flavorText: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Boros erbauten ein Gefängnis im Himmel, wo ihr Rechtsempfinden nicht von Azorius-Statuten eingeengt werden konnte.
foreignData.name: Edikt der Engel
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: Los Boros construyeron una prisión en el cielo en la que los estatutos azorios no pudieran restringir su sentido de la justicia.
foreignData.name: Edicto angelical
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura o encantamiento objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Pour assouvir leur sens de la justice, les Boros bâtirent une prison dans le ciel, à l'abri des décrets d'Azorius.
foreignData.name: Édit angélique
foreignData.text: Exilez la créature ciblée ou l'enchantement ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: I Boros costruirono una prigione nel cielo dove i regolamenti Azorius non potevano limitare il loro senso della giustizia.
foreignData.name: Editto Angelico
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura o un incantesimo bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: ボロス軍は自分たちの正義がアゾリウスの法令に縛られることがないよう、天空に牢獄を造った。
foreignData.name: 天使の布告
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 보로스 군단은 아조리우스 상원의 방해 없이 정의를 구현하기 위해 하늘에 감옥을 지었다.
foreignData.name: 천사의 칙령
foreignData.text: 생물이나 부여마법 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os Boros construíram uma prisão no céu, onde os estatutos dos Azorius não podiam restringir seu conceito de justiça.
foreignData.name: Édito Angelical
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura ou encantamento alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Боросы построили тюрьму в небе, где законы Азориусов были бессильны ограничить их понятия о правосудии.
foreignData.name: Эдикт Ангела
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевое существо или чары.

foreignData.flavorText: 波洛斯建立了一座空中牢狱，俄佐立的法规在此处无法约束其正义感。

mainBoard.name: Syndic of Tithes
mainBoard.originalText: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

rulings.text: The amount of life you gain from extort is based on the total amount of life lost, not necessarily the number of opponents you have. For example, if your opponent's life total can't change (perhaps because that player controls Platinum Emperion), you won't gain any life.
The extort ability doesn't target any player.
The extort ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. The ability resolves even if that spell is countered.
You may pay {W/B} a maximum of one time for each extort triggered ability. You decide whether to pay when the ability resolves.

mainBoard.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

mainBoard.name: Contaminated Ground
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

rulings.text: Contaminated Ground's last ability triggers whenever the enchanted land becomes tapped for any reason, not just when it's tapped for mana.

If, while casting a spell or activating an ability, the enchanted land's controller taps the land for mana to pay for it, Contaminated Ground's ability triggers and goes on the stack on top of that spell or ability. Contaminated Ground's ability will resolve first.

On the other hand, the enchanted land's controller may tap the land for mana, let Contaminated Ground's ability trigger and go on the stack, then spend that mana to cast an instant or activate an ability in response. In that case, that instant or ability will resolve first.

The enchanted land loses its existing land types and any abilities printed on it. It now has the land type Swamp and has the ability to tap to add {B}. Contaminated Ground doesn't change the enchanted land's name or whether it's legendary, basic, or snow.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

mainBoard.name: Gutter Skulk

"The skies used to be my refuge, a place of peace away from the chaos below. Now, with every flight, death seems to follow me like a shadow."
—Writings of Cica, Skyjek scout

mainBoard.name: Syndicate Enforcer
mainBoard.originalText: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

rulings.text: The amount of life you gain from extort is based on the total amount of life lost, not necessarily the number of opponents you have. For example, if your opponent's life total can't change (perhaps because that player controls Platinum Emperion), you won't gain any life.
The extort ability doesn't target any player.
The extort ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. The ability resolves even if that spell is countered.
You may pay {W/B} a maximum of one time for each extort triggered ability. You decide whether to pay when the ability resolves.

foreignData.name: 오르조브 길드관문
foreignData.text:
오르조브 길드관문은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {W} 또는 {B}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Entre para encontrar riqueza, segurança e vida eterna... Mediante uma contribuição singela antecipada.
foreignData.name: Portão da Guilda Orzhov
foreignData.text: Portão da Guilda Orzhov entra no campo de batalha virado.{T}: Adicione {W} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: Войдите, и вы обретете богатство, спокойствие и вечную жизнь... за небольшую предоплату.
foreignData.name: Врата Гильдии Орзовов
foreignData.text:
Врата Гильдии Орзовов выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {B} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignData.flavorText: 此门背后藏有终身财富、安全保障和无尽永生...只要你肯先付点小钱。
foreignData.name: 欧佐夫公会门
foreignData.text:
欧佐夫公会门须横置进战场。
{T}：加{W}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

foreignData.flavorText: 此門背後藏有終身財富、安全保障和無盡永生...只要你肯先付點小錢。
foreignData.name: 歐佐夫公會門
foreignData.text:
歐佐夫公會門須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{W}或{B}到你的魔法力池中。

mainBoard.name: Orzhov Guildgate
mainBoard.originalText:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: Gate is not a basic land type.
The subtype Gate has no special rules significance, but other spells and abilities may refer to it.

mainBoard.text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
